creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: 20th c. Forgery; Lotus-form Incense Burner, body applied with four rows of petals on six down-turned leaves, set on a six-lobed platform inlaid in white with scrolled banding, and mounted on tripod with animal head feet, with filigree wood cover; blue-gray celadon.
title: Incense burner
